name: Silver Bubble
description: Silver Bubble is a supreme hybrid; a compelling mix of Haze, Northern Lights, and Skunk bred by DNA Genetics. It is a strain with a heavy Haze influence and has become a mainstay at the Amsterdam coffee shops, specifically Grey Area. Silver Bubble is a timeless Dutch strain that provides well-rounded effects and an aroma spiced with sandalwood.
descriptionPlain: Silver Bubble is a supreme hybrid; a compelling mix of Haze, Northern Lights, and Skunk bred by DNA Genetics. It is a strain with a heavy Haze influence and has become a mainstay at the Amsterdam coffee shops, specifically Grey Area. Silver Bubble is a timeless Dutch strain that provides well-rounded effects and an aroma spiced with sandalwood.

highlightedReviews.text: Picked this up in Dam and was in the top 3 smokes of the weekend. Really enjoyable happy, mellowing stone. Looks great (tight, dark nugs) smells great and doesn't empty the wallet like some strains out there. Awesome. Definitely a go to strain.
Stil top shelf stuff calm high raw bud n smoking smells fruity im sensein a haze high flowery smell got giggles n hungryðŸ¤” rate 4.5

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Gigabud, Super Jack, Silver Bubble, StarBud, and Red Diesel
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
The holidays are officially in full-swing, and if you're relaxing properly, there's a good chanceÂ your stash jar is getting low. Worry not, Leafly friends: we have plenty of new strains for you to explore this weekend! Here are five strains nominated by our users who voted using the Leafly app.
For more festive suggestions, be sure to check out Leafly's Holiday Survival Guide where we point out ourÂ favorite strains for appetite stimulation, relaxation, stress relief, and more.
Go forth, rate, review, and enjoy!
